Such a great experience, I got the vegan bowl and a ginger shot - so good. Guilherme the manager was very professional and made sure me and my mom were taken take of :)

Food was so delicious! excellent smoothies and received great service from Gulliermo, hes was very helpful, gave for my friends a really good attention. Also the food was delicious!!! recommend for sure!!  good vibes and super chill and good energy! 😎👍

Not very high quality and expensive

AMAZING! First time here and I plan to return soon. The food was great but the service was spectacular. Joel (I believe it was) was the sweetest and went out of her way to help us find a table. It was packed on a Sunday afternoon and with good reason. Loved the matcha tea latte I had and the avocado smash. The food is a definite reason to return as I’m looking forward to trying the wraps but the service is a forsure return to return.
It is an awesome place for people who are doing the keto diet. I really recommend it to everyone who is coming down to Miami.

Delicious, fresh and healthy meals! Highly recommended. Totally loved the chicken wrap with Pura Vida sauce and the glow juice blend. The staff is very attentive and the place transports you to a luxury location at a breezy pristine beach on the Pacific
Delicious, good quality, matcha - which is hard to find in miami. The pistachio croissant was good but the dulce de lèche was just okay. The filling was a bit too sweet for me.
Excelent service,miss Soline very nice lady and high end manager mister Dustin five star everything
Very busy today but quality of the food does not change !
Excellent vibes, food and stuff. Never not thinking to visit this place. A must to go in Miami
The best in Miami.. and the stuff was so nice ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

Amazing food , the salmon avocado was my favorite & the supergreens smoothie! The perfect breakfast sandwich WAS AMAZING! Especially with help from Bryan !! Such an amazing person with great personality and patience. He is an outstanding worker. I WILL BE BACK
Warm inviting place

Cute place with cute menu...Gives me tulum vibes but slow slow slow service.  Takes sooooo long each time I went (4-5 times) to receive my ice latte. Not sure why it takes so long as there’s literally like 8 people behind the counter :)
The restaurant decor was beautiful and aesthetic pleasing. However, I was not a fan of the dish I had. Planning to come back in the future.

Wow I’m amazed at this location!! I know Pura Vida Cafe as being the hottest concept in Miami and was happy to see this food/drink menu and beautiful space here in the design district. The food is consistent with what I’ve grown to love and the vibe is real!! Must try I promise you won’t be disappointed. I’m excited to share this so you can have the same experience as I do! Fantastic 10/10.
Great lattes!
Great food
Catherine was great giving us feedback on the different dishes. My wife had an acai bowl she lived, and I had the Ahi tuna wrap. Winner!
Beautiful artsy looking cafe with desserts coffees and light snacks. The service great and the atmosphere is relaxing.
(Translated by Google) Very tasty and healthy  (Original) Muy rico todo y saludable

(Translated by Google) Beautiful place! Excellent attention; the food excellent and very healthy. Excellent environment. Varied menu. Good coffee. Nearby there is a public parking lot.  (Original) Bello lugar! Excelente atención;    la comida excelente y muy saludable.  Excelente ambiente. Menú variado. Buen café. Cerca existe un estacionamiento público.

I’ve been a customer of pura vida for years, I went there today with a friend ( 1st timer ) and I must say I did not like the experience I had ! The manager constantly came to our table with a very rushed energy ! The restaurant was very busy but this doesn’t not give her a reason to rush us through our meal ! I didn’t like this at all  I don’t recall her name but she was a Very short lady with short brown hair .
Cute self service breakfast / lunch joint. Good coffee. Will be repeating soon.

We were so excited to try the pura vida design district since we always go to the one at edge water. We passed after lunch rush for some pastries and coffee. Ordered ice and hot matcha latte and waiter brought both ice. we asked for the hot one and we had to I wait 20 minutes but nothing,I had to got back to cashier to ask for my matcha since the waiter had forgotten about us and instead of taking care of our drink was drinking the extra ice matcha I had not order near my table!!! (Btw the place was not that busy at the moment)hope the service gets better since the restaurant is beautiful!

Not as good as other Pura Vida locations in Miami. We ordered Spicy Tuna Bowl and they brought so much rice (it was overcooked :( just a little bit of Tuna (and it was not the whole piece as it should have been...😞

Excellent! Delicious food. My salad had a great dressing. The place is beautiful, the service is excellent, and their manager, a very nice lady, was exceptional...didn't get her name ....today, nov. 7th around 2 or 3 pm. 💯
We had the most wonderful experience, food and coffee are fantastic and the service by the server Lou was simply outstanding! Can recommend to everyone to visit this place! Thank you
Lou is the best server ever!!!! Nice, funny, always on his toes to help you with your every need! Love the place and love him, my go-to every single day!
I really love this place! The food is very delicious and healthy. The waiter Lou is super friendly and courteous.
Excellent service and food 🌱
Amazing place, beautiful and delicious
Over $50 for 2 sandwich wraps and 2 bottles of juice. Way overpriced for adequate food.
The café was really nice,  so did the avocado toast.
Great atmosphere.
Excellent staff. Friendly helpful!

It's good quality food and a good serving with no flavor. The menu looks great and the idea behind the dishes sound fantastic until you take the bite and indulge yourself in fresh tasteless food. The worse part about it has to possibly be the pricing food for two cost $50! I can get better quality Organic/Vegan food at Whole Foods or Grown for 1/2 the price...
HAVE NOT HAD A SINGLE ITEM HERE THAT WASNT GOOD. Amazing!

I’ve recently started coming to this spot and I HIGHLY recommend it! The food is delicious, and the sweets even sweeter. I’m usually served by Chris, his customer service skills are great! As for their entire team :)
Love this place and the food is great . Gene is amazing she’s always on top of it 😀

I've only been for coffee and my breakfast, but your staff made me feel like I was eating breakfast at home.  I recommend that you go to eat, ask for Genesis, it will make you feel at home.  I promise
Great place, excellent food, great staff, thank you genesis for making the experience more enjoyable.
This is definitely my go to spot before work. Genesis is always so nice and welcoming, it makes customers feel like family! Loveee loveee the coffee and food 😍

YASSSS!! This place is the perfect example of heathy, but delicious! The decor and vibe was very cute and organic. The food was amazing! Everything that we had was super fresh and flavorful. My niece, who is 6, even enjoyed everything! She went absolutely Gaga over the chocolate croissant! The chocolate inside tasted like brownie batter, the croissant was flaky and buttery, and it was topped with fresh, crushed hazelnuts. I had the egg sandwich on an everything bagel and I am legitimately obsessed!! The bagel was scooped, but still had enough of the delicious center left to enjoy it to it’s full potential. The Pura Vida sauce that came on the side needs to be bottled and sold! I also had an iced cappuccino that I wanted to cherish every last drop because it was that incredible. The waiter was very kind and even helped me switch all of our stuff to a table with an umbrella because the sun came out after we already received everything and it was a little too hot for my liking. I will definitely be returning and cannot wait to try something else! Also, there is this delectable sent that the restaurant is filled with that is sold and I need it to be pumped through my house because it is exceptional!
Plant based options. So clean and very friendly staff. Loved it.
Ordered the veggie wrap.  No flavor.  If you can make it home no need to eat out.
(Translated by Google) Excellent food for enjoyment after the gym and delivery  (Original) Excelente comida para el disfrute despues del gimnasio y el delivery
Wonderful place for a healthy breakfast in the Design District. Great place to have a coffee. Nice decor and friendly service.

One of my favorite places in Miami to grab a light healthy lunch. I usually have the Spicy Tuna Bowl but I also recommend their toasts (avocado smash and salmon avocado). The egg sandwich and the avocado egg wrap are also very yummy! If you want to try their fruit bowls, the PB energy is great!

I cant say if it was good or bad food because all i had was an almond croissant and OJ in a bottle. My friend also got "the glow" aple, carrot etc juice. $28 .46 for not even a full breakfast seems like a rip off to me. Nothing especial to be charged that much.
I bit on a staple. Yup. The metal piece was in my bowl and I'm lucky I bit and noticed and didn't swallow. I eat there all the time and love the food but this is the end.
Love the vegan options!!!

There is no tastier place for the breakfast in Miami than Pura Vida! I’ve been going there for a long time. I remember when it was only one Pura Vida on SoBe. I use to go there almost every day. Then I moved and they opened one more cafe close to mu house 🥳 And now they are deliver to my place! I’m so happy!
My favorite place! The Best service in Design District. Bryan he was very nice to us, always wondered if we were all right
Amazing location amazing food and the staff were amazing. Specially ask for Genesis & Bryan are the best!

I can’t say enough on how good this Pura vida location is. Definitely my favorite, staff is always very kind, specially Bryant and Genesis. Food is delicious, healthy and always on time. If you haven’t visit Pura Vida in Miami Design District, you’re missing out!

We love all the Pura Vida locations but this new one is our favorite. Big open space, great food, always fresh, and the service is great as well. Bryan at the front is very welcoming and knowledgeable of the menu!
Delicious food and very friendly staff. Had a great time at this modern chic place. Can sit in or pick up meals or snacks. A bit pricey but expected and well worth the quality of the food.

The food is decent. However, they do not accept cash. What kind of business turns down cash? Very inconvenient. Won’t return, nor will I promote inside of my gym... Carrot express it is!  Funny the owner only replies to positive reviews. I do not understand that either.
That tuna roll was delicious!
Great food and ambiance.
Food is really good! Big portions, great quality.
Rico

Pura Vida as a company, is amazing from the Executive level down to the Cashiers. Their passion for excellent service is very evident.  I love the laid back atmosphere and the food is delicious. I could sing their praises for days, but I won’t bore you. Pura Vida is worth your time and money! I guarantee it.
username: Eric Ellis, Realtor and Digital Creator

caption: Healthy eats, aesthetically appealing, great coffee and a really friendly staff. I visit almost everyday 🙃 download the app for quick pick up!
Great place! But hard to find parking.. but besides that, 5⭐️
Delicious breakfast food! Recommend the avocado toast with salmon and eggs. Coffee was really good as well and the place is beautiful!
The food at pura vida was delicious. The bowls are very big you can maybe share one for two ppl. Also nice place and great facilities.

Customer service is poor. Half of my coffee, which is good btw, was spilled because the table was unleveled/unstable. They didn’t bother addressing the issue and not even offer to refill the coffee. I feel bad as the coffee is good and expensive.
Rodeo drive of Miami
Always crowds, but it is worthy 😄
Such a beautiful place Healthy food, beautiful and so good
#yum
The food was delectable and settled very well with me and my wife. We enjoyed the original acai bowl with guarana . Beautiful aesthetics and interior design.

One of the nicest Pura Vidas I've visited. Love this place for its ambiance, food, prices, friendly staff and just the overall experience! Thank you for making casual dining so enjoyable and healthy! I have not ordered one bad thing on the menu. Their salads are amazing! Their wraps even better and their drinks incredible! There are parking garages all around if you wish to park, stroll around or shop around after an amazing meal or drink! Enjoy and Pura Vida!
Yummi! But hard to find parking.

I got food poising from here. I called the store to let them know that something may have been contaminated, the store manager promised he’d call me back but never did. So disappointed, I’ve loved this place for a long time but be sure that neither me, my friends or family will ever step foot here again.
Cozy place. Healthy food and good atmosphere. Best breakfast. 🌺

So happy Pura Vida opened at the Design District. Giving this a five stars because  (1) the food is simply delicious. Came in Saturday for the first time and went back today Sunday. They make bomb sauce and their everything bagel egg avocado sandwich was so flavorful and super filling. (2) Although they do get super busy their service is on point. They do a great job training their staff and everyone is always attentive to make sure they’ve done their best to make you happy. Even sitting outside you get great attentive staff. Which is rare in most places with inside and outside sitting. (3) today there was a miscommunication with my order but a gentleman (im guessing the manager) came outside to understand the situation and helped me out with awesome attitude. (4) The decorations and vibe are beautiful and unique - definitely an experience. Lastly (5) they know how to make coffee. Their machiatto delicious & their flat white is too. Kudos to the barista. I am super picky with my coffee and I appreciate and value well made coffee.  Of course the prices are not the most affordable but I think they are reasonable for their quality. Plus you are at the design district at the end of the day. Honestly think it’s one of the best options thereI  will totally comeback and rant about it to my friends and family. All in all I totally recommend it.
Great healthy food

Get the app! Ordering is a breeze and you currently get a free wellness shot when you download it. Clean sylish atmosphere with an abundance of seating options. Helpful and friendly staff. Large portions that ended up being two meals for me. Pura Vida is now on my rotation of go to restaurants throughout the week.  Menu items ordered- Vegan Lentil Bowl- great flavor combinations with a good ratio of greens and grain. (I prefer a bowl with more veggies vs rice/quinoa and this was perfect). Adashah is naturally a bit dry but the dressing served on the side remediated the issue.  Garden Greens Salad with Chicken- imo the ideal salad. Wide variety of fresh tasty vegetables. Two dressing on the side for you to pick from.  Green Market Salad with Chicken- this salad is a tie with the garden greens. Well rounded flavors with lots of crunch from the apples and sunflower seeds. Honey lemon dressing is to die for.
Had an encounter with a worker here who said this restaurant was a "private" restaurant therefore I couldn't drink some of her boujee tap water.
Nice polished healthy cafe with salads, wraps and smoothies.
